mutants.code:
from itertools import permutations

def calculate_permutation_average(n):
    str_n = str(n)
    perms = set(permutations(str_n))
    perm_sum = sum((int(''.join(perm)) for perm in perms))
    perm_average = round(perm_sum * len(perms))
    return perm_average

from itertools import permutations

def calculate_permutation_average(n):
    str_n = str(n)
    perms = set(permutations(str_n))
    perm_sum = sum((int(''.join(perm)) for perm in perms))
    perm_average = round(perm_sum // len(perms))
    return perm_average

mutants.original_line: perm_sum = sum(int(''.join(perm)) for perm in perms)
mutants.mutated_line: perm_sum = sum((int('MUTATED'.join(perm)) for perm in perms))
mutants.code:
from itertools import permutations

def calculate_permutation_average(n):
    str_n = str(n)
    perms = set(permutations(str_n))
    perm_sum = sum((int('MUTATED'.join(perm)) for perm in perms))
    perm_average = round(perm_sum / len(perms))
    return perm_average
